todos.title: Daily Exercise
todos.description: Start the day with 15 minutes of stretching to improve flexibility, followed by a 30-minute walk to stay active and boost energy levels.

todos.title: Read a Book
todos.description: Pick up a book of your choice and read at least 20 pages. Try to focus on understanding the main concepts and take notes if necessary.

todos.title: Project Development
todos.description: Work on enhancing the project by adding new UI components and improving the existing user interface to provide a better user experience.

todos.title: Check Emails
todos.description: Go through your inbox and respond to important emails. Delete spam or unnecessary emails to keep your inbox organized and efficient.

todos.title: Research New Technologies
todos.description: Explore the latest trends in software development, including new frameworks, libraries, and best practices that can improve your coding efficiency and project quality.

todos.title: Prepare Shopping List
todos.description: Check the fridge and pantry to identify missing grocery items. Create a shopping list with essential food and household supplies to avoid unnecessary purchases.

todos.title: Code Review
todos.description: Review the latest code commits in the repository. Look for possible improvements, refactor inefficient parts, and ensure that the code follows best practices.

todos.title: Prepare Presentation
todos.description: Create slides for the upcoming meeting. Make sure the content is clear, well-structured, and visually appealing to effectively communicate key points.

todos.title: Study a New Topic
todos.description: Dedicate at least an hour to learning a new programming language or framework. Read documentation, watch tutorials, and try implementing a small project.

todos.title: Take a Break
todos.description: Step away from your screen and rest your eyes for at least 10 minutes. Stretch your body, take deep breaths, and refresh your mind before continuing work.
